properties.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT p.id as IDProcesso, sp.Id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio,sla.c_data_fim as DataFim,dp.c_escalar_processo
FROM shkprocesses sp
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo = sp.Id
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')
AND dp.c_escalar_processo LIKE IF('#currentUser.groups.name#' LIKE '%Coordenadores%', '%coordenadores%',IF('#currentUser.groups.name#' LIKE '%Diretor Coordenador%','%diretorCoordenador%',IF('#currentUser.department.name#' LIKE '%PL_INT_ADM%','%administracao%','Sem valor')))
ORDER BY Urgencia desc, LimitTime desc
